alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Magoffin; Morgan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 8:00AM EDT until July 29 at 8:30AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Morgan County in southeastern Kentucky... Southwestern Johnson County in northeastern Kentucky... Northwestern Floyd County in southeastern Kentucky... Northeastern Breathitt County in southeastern Kentucky... Magoffin County in southeastern Kentucky... Northeastern Wolfe County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 830 AM EDT. * At 800 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Helechawa, or 10 miles south of West Liberty, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Burg around 805 AM EDT. Epson around 810 AM EDT. Ova around 815 AM EDT. Hendricks around 820 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Mason and Marshallville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Magoffin; Morgan; Wolfe
